As a Data Analyst, you will play a crucial role in supporting our in-house digital agency team by analysing and interpreting data to drive strategic decision-making.

Your primary responsibility will be to develop and maintain comprehensive dashboards on PowerBI, providing actionable insights and recommendations based on data analysis. You will integrate a data team and collaborate closely with the digital marketing team to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign performance, and uncover opportunities for optimization.

‚Ä¢ Perform in-depth analysis of data to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights.

‚Ä¢ Conduct ad hoc analysis to answer specific business questions and support decision-making.

‚Ä¢ Create data visualisations, reports, and presentations to effectively communicate findings and recommendations to experts.

‚Ä¢ Monitor data quality, identify data discrepancies, and work with relevant teams to ensure data accuracy and consistency.

‚Ä¢ Stay up to date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging tools in data analysis, visualization, and reporting.

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in creating interactive dashboards and reports using PowerBi.

‚Ä¢ Knowledge on Python and SQL for data extraction, manipulation and automation is highly desirable.

‚Ä¢ Knowledge on Databricks and Microsoft fabric is a plus.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with digital marketing concepts, metrics and platforms (e.g., LinkedIn Ads and Google Analytics) is a plus.

‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills with the ability to present complex data findings in a clear and concise manner to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
